page.title: 15TRANSPORT IN WILLOUGHBY
page.content: There are a lot people who travel by {car.}They use cars for things like shopping, local visits and going to work. Some people also use car for their holidays.The next most popular from of transport is the{bicycle. People use this for work,relaxation, shopping , going to school and sometimes for looking at the countryside.Some people travel on{foot to do shopping in the village and just for leisure. The{bus}is still fairly popular for shopping in Nottingham,to go to school and work, and for pleasure.At school we use a bus once a week to travel to the swimming pool at keyworth.A service bus runs about five times a day from Nottingham to Leicester and transports village children to and from the comprehensive school in Keyworth.
